Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for several years now and I have no idea why I've never rated it. I absolutely love it and it hasn't failed on me yet. The batter lasts for a very long time. It is easy to use for those of us who suck at technology related items and the quality of the photos are pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Thompson
Reviews.Content: This camera is for my daughter, It has to take lots of abuse and so far it has work great!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Max Power
Reviews.Content: A Christmas present for my girlfriend who likes everything pink. I have had a Canon PowerShot for years and love it.

Reviews.Title: Nice compact camera WITH VIEWFINDER!
Reviews.Author: akh
Reviews.Content: My wife really wanted a shirt pocket sized camera as a backup to her Nikon, but she wanted a viewfinder. It's becoming harder and harder to find viewfinders on anything less than the DSLR's, but this Canon had one. It's not perfect, but for those times when it is really bright out, or you are having problems holding the camera steady, the viewfinder is very handy.

Reviews.Title: Not horrible but not great
Reviews.Author: momofone
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for over a year now. It got the job done but I never got the quality of picture I wanted. I compaired this to my mothers Cannon camera which is only a 7.1 mega pixle and her camera was getting much better quality than this 10 mega pixle. I have finally replaced it with a Nikon Coolpix S9300 which is a 16 mega pixle for the same cost as this camera. I made this choice only after going to a store and taking pictures with mulitple cameras to see which got the best picture.

Reviews.Title: Just okay
Reviews.Author: Shorty
Reviews.Content: I generally love Canon cameras, and I've owned quite a few models, but I regret buying this one.Pros:* Technically, the camera is perfect.  It's never malfunctioned, even after being submerged in water.* It's lightweight, records video, has a decent shutter speed, and takes relatively wide angle photos.Cons:* Takes awful pictures. Even with the flash off, the quality is abysmal.  * Unflattering portraits.* Excessive digital noise.* Records blurry and grainy video with bad sound.Good for taking pictures of weird clouds in the sky, stray animals in your yard, or bathroom wall graffiti.  As it should be.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: SolarChild
Reviews.Content: Best camera I have ever owned. Takes amazing photos. Very strong and lasts long. Unfortunately mine fell in the beach water and spoiled, which was no fault of the cameras, otherwise it would have still been here for many more years!

Reviews.Title: I've Taken Too Long to Rate the Best Camera I've Ever Owned!
Reviews.Author: Poison Ivy "TCM Fan"
Reviews.Content: I use a digital camera for 'before and after' photos for my clients.  Also, I'm the 'family photo taker'.  I always have a camera with me.  Over the past seven years I've owned two Kodaks (One I left on top of a rental car in FL and drove off. The other Kodak I left SOMEWHERE?), a Sony Cybershot DSC-W150 and in March 2010 I purchased my beautiful turquoise Canon PowerShot.None of my previous cameras could handle the photo load I demanded nor could any of them hold a charge long enough for me.  Meaning, they wouldn't stay charged for a day---throughout an event.  And basically, that's all us amateurs want...a camera that holds a battery charge and takes LOTS of photos AND movies!Enter my Canon cutie, this camera is more than awesome.  Its simple to operate and the memory card is awesome. I've taken over 800 photos without charging the battery or downloading photos.  That was unheard of with the Sony (the Sony failed on me---the shutter stopped opening---kinda hard to take photos without that working feature).One of my favorite features is the 'repeat photo' feature which allows you to take one photo after the other by simply holding your finger down on the 'capture' button. This is great for photographing grandchildren at play.  Of course I could switch to 'movie mode' but I like the spontaneity of this feature.The blurriness and grainy photos mentioned in some reviews sound like they're due to low resolution settings. If you want to open the box and start clicking, you can do that.  I did and got great results.  But I've also taken blurry photos when my settings were not correct for the circumstance.For instance, to use the super focus feature, you have to hold the capture button down half-way momentarily for the camera to focus, then click.  But you can turn this feature off too.  If you want great results, you might want to take a look at the directions!Bottom line, it's just an impressive camera! If some terrible calamity befalls my beloved Canon, which I've taken extra care to ensure that does not happen...I won't think twice about replacing her with a twin.  I purchased a nice little case that fits on my belt and I keep all of her little accessories in there.  You'll LOVE her, I promise!

Reviews.Title: BAD BAD BAD
Reviews.Author: Pakwolve
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your money!  This camera really struggles and I am very disappointed in its performance.  Basically this camera just takes very poor pictures.  I do a lot of hiking and usually my shots are taken with great lighting... You would think with a 300 dollar point and shoot that with good lighting you should have no problem taking good crisp shots.  Unfortunately, all of my shots seem to be the exact opposite.  The color is TERRIBLE, the image is usually grainy and/or fuzzy, and it is overall very lackluster.  I am actually not too particular in my shots.  I would have been happy with average picture quality but unfortunately they aren't even that.  I expect more for my money...  especially from Canon!UNSATISFIED CUSTOMER

Reviews.Title: Camera and customer service were below par...
Reviews.Author: Nothing new "biased_perspective"
Reviews.Content: My Powershot took blurry pictures continuously which I could not resolve.  Also, in the sun, the back display disappeared.  I contacted customer service about both issues and sent in the camera (still under warranty).  I then received a bill in the mail for more than the camera was worth and when I contacted them about this they said it was b/c I did not send in the proper paperwork.  I resent the same paperwork and they performed a "hard reset" of the camera (not sure why a hard reset of the software would cost over $100).  Well, the hard reset did not fix either problem and you can see where this review is going so I will spare you the future details of being stuck with a camera that does not work.  Very disappointed with the customer service that actually LIED to me since they actually sent me my ORIGINAL paperwork that they said they did not receive which is why they were going to charge me.  I will say the camera does occasionally take good pictures and videos but when that is the exception, that makes for a bad camera.

Reviews.Title: Flawless Function, Everytime
Reviews.Author: Beejman
Reviews.Content: This was one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon.The camera is simple, easy to use, just like all Cannons.  There is enough available timing/lighting modifications to make it fun if you're into that kind of thing, but if you're just pointing and clicking, this camera works incredibly fast.  No triple bright refocus settings, no blinding flashes.  It just takes pictures accurately and clearly the first time with minimal focus delay.I've also beat the hell out of it, and it still works.  Always a good thing to report.Been to Europe twice and Mexico once.... still ticking.Even survived my 5 year old nephew.

Reviews.Title: Looooove this camera! Canon is the best.
Reviews.Author: L. Casey
Reviews.Content: This was my first Canon camera!! I absolutely love everything about it. Great picture quality and construction/physique. GREAT macro shots and focusing. However when I let my sister hold onto it one night she spilled beer on it and killed it.. sad sad moment for me. I had to switch to a cheaper camera and its not the same at all. I miss this camera sooo much. Canon is hands down the best quality and best at making cameras! One day I hope to own another Canon and will treasure and guard it with my life!!I recommend this camera to anyone! Really fast and easy to use. You'll love it :-)

Reviews.Title: Best Little Camera For Your Money
Reviews.Author: sprucehen
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  Fits in my pocket and can take it anywhere (except near water).  Takes nice sharp photos.  Great indoor and nighttime pics with flash.  All the bells and whistles the average person would need.  I like that you have a choice of viewfinder or screen.  Got it on sale and it's a great value.  No other camera in this price range compares.  I get lots of compliments on the quality of my photos.  Have been using for the past year or so and couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Happy sis!
Reviews.Author: Yonna
Reviews.Content: Got this camera as a gift for my sister and she loves it! Quality could be better but for this price it is OK!Very small and practical! She love it but i could not shot without my Canon 5d Markii :-))))

Reviews.Title: Great Gift Idea!
Reviews.Author: Sammy
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my little sister.  Turned out to be a great gift idea.  Very nice camera and very easy to use.  The different color options for the camera makes it fun gift especially for teenager.  Highly recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: My daughter is 14 year old, needless to say she is careless about stuff adn eventhough she has dropped the camera several times, exposed it to the sun for a prolonged period of time etc etc, it is still working!!! The only issue is the zoom that is not very good so the camera is great for close pictures only. Perfect camera for teenagers!

Reviews.Title: Much faster than my previous camera
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because it turned on fast and I would not have to wait and miss the shot. works great. I dont use all the bells and whistles but I like it, and does what i want. Id buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: wife's a shutterbug
Reviews.Content: Probably the best Christmas gift I've ever given my wife.She goes to all the school sports games our grandchildren play. The same can be said for our nieces and nephews. She takes many pictures. This camera is small enough for her purse, has a view finder for the shot and a screen to check the picture. I no longer have to listen to her complain about not being able to get the shot she wanted.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power shot camera
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. It is very easy to use. I bought this after my 5 year old kodak camera could no longer upload pictures onto the computer. Picture quality is great, read the instruction book to understand all the features. Battery life is also very good. I love this camera.

Reviews.Title: I wish I didn't loose it!!
Reviews.Author: Looking for the Perfect Item
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in Jan of 2010 and I LOVE IT!! It is awesome! It does such a great job at stabilization that I can had it to my 4 yr old and let him take pictures and 4 out of 5 of them will turn out awesome even though he ran, jumped, and spun while shooting the pictures! I could also take pictures out the window in my car while driving 80mph and have very little blur from the trees going by!!I'm so sad I misplaced this camera! I want it back because no other camera I have owned compares to this camera!! I hope I find it soon!!

Reviews.Title: great 1st digital
Reviews.Author: Mr. William D. Lytle "arfnick"
Reviews.Content: This is a great 1st time camera for the novice.  The automatic setting is a godsend.  A true point and shoot camera.  I'm seriously considering the aquisition of Canon's $50 Photo printer.  I'm now known as the Matthew Brady of the neighborhood.  Matthew never had it this easy.

Reviews.Title: Canon ELPH
Reviews.Author: Photographer's wife
Reviews.Content: We already have one of these cameras and love it.  The portability is perfect for a shirt pocket and the photos are excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Fred Luna
Reviews.Content: Nice point-and-shoot with great picture quality. No big surprises, since Canon is one of the best manufacturers of digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: Auto settings horrible!
Reviews.Author: Craig Smith
Reviews.Content: I loved my previous version of this camera, but the auto settings are horrible.  About 50% of the photos are either out of focus or grainy like a 2 MP camera.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfying gift, great value for $
Reviews.Author: C. Le
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift, looking for something within my budget. Best camera for its price range. Great value. My gift receiver loves it. She brought it on a trip & took many pictures with this. She showed me the pictures after her trip & the colors on the pictures were great too.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Alligator
Reviews.Content: This camera has far exceeded my expectations!  I purchased it a year ago and haven't had a single problem with it at all!  Very easy to use and upload pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera -- High Quality Photos
Reviews.Author: KT
Reviews.Content: We love this Canon camera.  For a point-and-shoot, it takes excellent quality pictures and is easy to use.  Nice, compact size, too.  We definitely would recommend this product, especially for the free shipping price at Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Liv
Reviews.Content: Had this same model once before and really liked it and so I bought another. Its very easy to use and takes awesome pictures!

Reviews.Title: High Quality; Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Kathleen G.
Reviews.Content: I am very happy to own this Canon Powershot model! I have owned a few Canons before this one and I find that the features have mostly kept improving, year to year and model to model. The picture quality is fantastic; much clearer than years before. The size is nice too; I can actually walk around with this in my pocket and not feel incredibly cramped.One thing that I dislike is the size of the viewfinder - quite small, and not as useful as I'm accustomed to. However, seeing as how most people don't really use this part of the camera nowadays, I suppose it's not really a negative factor for most of today's casual photographers. The battery lasts quite a while, (I took it on a five-day trip to Utah, Vegas and the Grand Canyon, without charging it at all!) but if you are switching from a camera running on AA batteries to a rechargable one, remembering the charger is a new habit you'll have to get used to. It saves so much money though, that the convinience of buying batteries at any drugstore is swiftly overshadowed by the convinience of a battery that rarely dies.Other features are relatively easy to use; the wheel maintains it's place as on most canons, although you might have to do a bit of tinkering to find all of the settings. I dislike not having a 'fireworks' or 'beach' setting, but seeing as how exposure time is quickly reached with a single button, (top of the circle under the wheel), it's really just a matter of clicking a few different controls. There are too many great features to list that would make up for the slight differences this camera might have to whatever you might be switching from.All in all, I'd recommend this camera to anyone. It's easy enough for a rare user to understand, and convinient enough to serve as a more portable device for semi-professional photographers without the option of space or equipment. Just play around with it; I'm sure you'll have loads of fun!

Reviews.Title: SAYS RED BUT LOOKS HOT PINK
Reviews.Author: blancababii
Reviews.Content: it looks pink but says red in english and spanish but i just went with my gut and got it so its hot pink ,i love it it takes great pics weather someone is moving or not, video is good too came with everything listed . i think its worth the $$ for it

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.  Why don't they keep making it.
Reviews.Author: edsbrain
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome. I am partial to Canon stuff but this little camera fits in your pocket, turns on fairly quick, has a great picture (10MP) and can hold a million pictures with the right little card inserted.  Buy another battery though as you will quickly forget how long this battery actually lasts and then you are caught with the little light flashing that is it finally time to charge it.  the extra battery is like $60 with some gadgets included like a tripod, carrying case and other stuff.  And the process of switching out the battery is quick and easy as well.  Did I mention the price of this camera.  It was a bargain when I first bought mine two years ago for like $350.  This one was purchased for my wife.  Now we each have the same camera, and she can have it on her person all the time now.  Without myself searching for mine.  Also... all of the cords and cards and software and everything else are the same and compatible.  Truly functional, awesome and priced right.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: BUY THIS CAMERA.  I've had it for a year and find that it takes great pictures and movies.  The battery lasts longer than I had expected.  I put in an 8 GB card and gave it to my wife and told her to nuts with it while we travel.  We have no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Canon powershot sd1200
Reviews.Author: Daydreamer
Reviews.Content: One of the very best features of this Canon is the viewfinder. Picture quality is outstanding. I've taken pictures outdoors, the pictures have been clear and crisp. I have taken quite a few pictures indoors with equally impressive results.I would highly recommend the Canon PowerShot SD 1200 IS to anyone looking for a reasonably priced digital camera that is extremely simple to use and yet loaded with great features.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! I am not a professional photographer, but this camera makes me look like one! I show people photos that I have taken and they questions that I have taken them and that it came from my little Cannon. I highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera- Amazing Picture Quality!
Reviews.Author: sara pezzoli
Reviews.Content: Great Purchase!!!  Real fast shutter speed, lightweight, stylish, a TRUE point and shoot!!!  Only complaint it that the internal gears are a little loud when that lens is adjusting and focusing.  Really not a big deal though.  Very happy with our purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: G. Phillips
Reviews.Content: I wanted to upgrade my old Canon Elph from the SD1000 and saw this one. I am very happy with it, I am also very happy with the seller. I ordered this not thinking that my birthday was coming up, but ended up getting it on my birthday, and gift wrapped as well!! Anyway, this camera is a joy, small and light - it takes great photos in almost any condition. The videos as well are wonderful - great color and sound quality. Wonderful camera for most anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Mshaw
Reviews.Content: So happy with this camera! I did as another reviewer suggested, and put the setting on kids and pets. Drunken pictures for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!  Easy to use and carry!
Reviews.Author: C. Parker
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera!  Mom of three kids...got it for my birthday because it's so easy to bring everywhere.  Takes great pictures and is so easy to use!  Teenage daughter liked it so much, she bought one for herself.  Highly recommend this camera!  Shipped same day!

Reviews.Title: great point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: C. Greene
Reviews.Content: We have had this camera for a while now and are very happy with it.  The battery has a very long life even if we do not use it for an extended period of time.  There is no lag from the time you push the button to the time the picture is actually taken.  Our other camera is a Canon SLR so to say that we are happy with anything less is a big deal.  As with all camera if you zoom into the digital zoom things start to look funny.  It is best to get close by using your feet instead of the zoom.  low light shots are good compared to most that I have seen with similar cameras.  I would definitely recommend this camera for those that want high quality shots with good portability.

Reviews.Title: love it.
Reviews.Author: Sandra Shipley "Sandy at RMR"
Reviews.Content: I'm not a real technology lover, but this is easy to use and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Compact camera that is easy to use
Reviews.Author: KGoradia
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera for last 2 years and I have used Canon cameras for several years. Canon picture quality for compact cameras is outstanding. Colors come out clear and vivid. LCD screen is decent size. Videos are easy to take. It does not have infinite settings to choose from but for a point and shoot camera, I think it has plenty of features.

Reviews.Title: Christmas present for husband
Reviews.Author: E. Carwile "Weim Mom"
Reviews.Content: He wanted a small flat camera to put in pocket and use from horseback.  This fit the bill and the IS was an added feature which works great when trying to take pictures from horseback.  Camera takes great pictures and has more options then we have used.  Picture quality is very good.  Husband is very happy with camera and that makes me happy!

Reviews.Title: Review of the Canon PowerShot SD 1200IS Camera
Reviews.Author: T.L. CenVal
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a digital camera for under $200 hundred dollars and came across the Canon Sd1200. After purchasing it at the price amazon was offering and using it I can say overall I am very satisfied with my choice. It produces really clear pictures, it's very easy to use, takes pictures fast, and it's size makes it easy to carry with you. Granted, I wasn't looking for a camera to turn out professional level shots,  just casual ones, and it has met my expectations. Though I haven't had it for that long, so I can't attest to it's durability. Otherwise, I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: JohnnyBeagle
Reviews.Content: All I wanted was a simple, easy to use camera that had a view finder like a old "film" type.  I am farsighted and the viewfinders that are screens are impossible for me to use without my reading glasses - and with reading glasses, I can't see far!  I also had no use for a lot of features.  All I wanted was a camera that took high quality pictures and was not so small that I might mistake it for a credit card!  My son did some research and came up with this camera.  It's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: mnm
Reviews.Content: I needed a small camera that would fit in my pocket but still take great pictures for a vacation.  This fit the bill in every way, and was even better than expected.  Pictures are crystal clear, even with zoom, and extreme close ups work just as well.  I have a ton of beautiful pictures, taken outside, inside, daytime and night, everything worked great.  Would highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Well Read
Reviews.Content: My daughter used and older model of this camera in her digital photography class and fell in love with it.  I purchased the up dated version and we are all please with the camera.  Has plenty of extras and video and prints come out clear.  Great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: SD1200 Buyer - A Refugee from Sony
Reviews.Author: SoCalHome
Reviews.Content: As the subject suggests, I'm now a Canon cheerleader and a refugee as a previous Sony owner.  Sony's absolutely absurd 'proprietary' batteries, cables, and accessories finally caused me to say 'enough, already!'  What a treat the simple SD1200 has been.  I'm old-fashioned, so the viewfinder was one of the main selling points of the SD1200.  While not terribly accurate, a viewfinder is a very important feature when shooting under a bright sun.  The LCD screen just craps out under very bright ambient light.  This camera's electronic features, combined with a handy size and weight, makes it an outstanding simple point-and-shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: small and perfect
Reviews.Author: Gsus
Reviews.Content: if you are just looking for small portable camera to take your everyday pictures this one its exactly what you are looking for..

Reviews.Title: I Love it
Reviews.Author: N.S.
Reviews.Content: Great little camera I use as a backup. I am tired of lugging my D50 with all the lenses everytime I go to a picnic or random event. I wanted to get a pocket cam for a long time and this is just it.

Reviews.Title: Great little digital point & shoot
Reviews.Author: Jason McKenna
Reviews.Content: There are some very well written reviews here, so I'll keep mine simple. This is a great little point & shoot you can easily fit in your pocket! Long battery life, and well built. Owned for over two years and it's still going strong.My only complaint is the typical (of all brands) plastic tripod mount. If you're careful, it should last till a newer, more powerful, and lower cost unit hit's the market. I would recommend this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Best Buy
Reviews.Author: C. E. Addison
Reviews.Content: This is the first digital camera after many years of film use.  Amazed at the quality of photos and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Bravo Canon!
Reviews.Author: Chien-Hsing Chen "bartz"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. With this price, I don't think I could find another one compete with it.

Reviews.Title: Another Winner from Canon!  Only one issue...
Reviews.Author: suburbanfashionista
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth PowerShot/SureShot from Canon.  I am hard on my cameras - I am a blogger so my camera is always in my bag, on my wrist, in my pocket.  I need a camera that is reliable, small, and can take clear, quick photos and videos.  When my last camera died a sad death from falling onto concrete, I knew I would come back to Canon.The only problem I have is that one reason I return to Canon is that over the years, I have accumulated plenty of batteries and chargers from dead cameras.  The PowerShot SD1200IS does NOT have the same size battery as the previous Canon cameras.  In fact, this battery isn't the same width as the Canon battery on my camcorder, my work's camcorders or my husband's professional Canon cameras.  I was really frustrated by this - I usually have a charger at work, one at home, have one available for travel in my bag.  I also like to have an extra battery on hand for travel.  With this camera, I would have to invest in all new equipment.That being said, this new battery holds charge for an incredibly long period of time.  I take at least one photo per day, and around 5 short videos per week.  I hadn't charged the battery in almost two weeks before I went to a 4-day music festival.  For four days, I took almost 200 photos and 15 videos.  The battery kept ticking through the whole event, no delay or slowing.  The battery didn't start to die until a couple days after my return.  I have never seen a battery last that long on any other camera!I find the body to be durable, more so than previous Canons I have bought.  The latch for the batter/card slots is pretty sturdy, the buttons are flush against the back of the camera so they aren't as likely to accidentally be pressed or scraped against something.  Speaking of buttons, I find them to be very user friendly - similar to other Canon cameras, easy to figure out even in the dark.Pictures are clear, don't get wash out from the flash, even night photos come out well.  Video works great - no complaints for the pricepoint of this camera!

Reviews.Title: Cannon 1200: It's a small marvel!
Reviews.Author: Lloyd Blanton
Reviews.Content: Quality is excellent (when on the maximum density); Battery life exceeds any other; automatic features and the circuitry are far better than expected.All in all, it is a very fine piece of photography equipment and will probably become my everyday favorite.Best small format point and shoot camera I've experienced, plus it has some good features for manual adjustments for special assignments.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: David Vanderport
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife as a birthday gift.  We took it to Walt Disney World at the end of May, 2010.  I ended up using it more than she did.  I literally took 1200 photos with it at Disney.  The photo quality is superb!I would have given it 5 overall stars if it wasn't for the "scene selection controls." I have become accustom to using the "Canon Power Shot A590"; so it was hard to get use to the scene selection controls.  With the A590 all the user needs to do is turn a knob to select a scene type.  This camera requires the user to access the menu to change scene types.  It's just a personal preference, but the A590 presets on the knob are more convenient as well.

Reviews.Title: Canon SD1200IS Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Holland
Reviews.Content: I like this camera and purchased this one rather than the newer model SD1300 because it still has the small peak hole for a viewer rather than just the screen. I find that many times with bright sun I cannot see the picture on the screen and the peak hole is the only way you can tell what you are shooting.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot 10 MP Camera
Reviews.Author: Chris Hill
Reviews.Content: I have a much better Canon that I use for professional photography, but as far as a "point and shoot" camera that you can just put in your pants pocket and go - this little gem is amazing.  The picture quality is great, and it's very easy to use even if you're not up on all the photographer stuff (has an automatic adjustment setting).  It was also about $30-40 cheaper here on Amazon than my local Best Buy (plus with free shipping); GREAT BUY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: canon sd1200is
Reviews.Author: Natasha "S"
Reviews.Content: I like canon digital cameras. I owned 3 or 4 before that one. I thought this one will be better then prevous models, but nothing much has been improved. Most of the time picture would come clear, but sometimes blurry, even all the settings are set up, the focusing not all the time does a good job when you need to take a quick picture and especially while moving. I still like canon but next time will try to buy other model.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: J. Armstrong
Reviews.Content: It's a small camera that takes a big picture.  Ultra portable and easy to use.  The flash is very good for such a little camera.  I am still on the first charge of the battery after messing around with this camera at home and taking it on a 5 day vacation shooting over one hundred pictures, mostly with flash.  While on vacation my wife and I shot some of the same picture only she was using a Canon Rebel xti.  The PowerShot picture was nearly as good.  The only difference was that the powerShot colors were not quite as brilliant.  I bought the PowerShot so I could take it anywhere and have it always ready.  Overall I am very happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: A good multi-use camera
Reviews.Author: Evolver
Reviews.Content: We needed this camera to replace my wife's last diaper bag camera. The price is good and the quality of the pictures is great. It focuses very quickly and has a nice feature to auto-focus on faces. Video quality is fine.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Natuzzi
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera so I'm clearly a novice. BUT, I love the size and look of the camera, and I find taking pictures with it really easy.  Haven't yet tried to get themonto the computer but directions make it look simple.  So far it's all great.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Point and Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: Ram Man
Reviews.Content: I had an opportunity to see the images from this little camera and get some first hand comments from some professional photographers so I had to buy it for my wife. I use a Canon T1i and she had a 4 year old Sony Cybershot. This is a fantastic camera for twice the price. I am amazed at the ease of use and the quality of the images.  I shot a couple of pictures at a ball field last night using the ambient light and they turned out really nice on fully automatic. If it has one downfall it is the 3x zoom.  A bit longer range would be nice but for convenience and price and quality of images, it is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Mom of 4
Reviews.Content: Our 5 year old camera died, and the reviews and price for this camera on amazon were pleasing.  I very happy with  my  purchase.  Good little camera.  Does the job well.  Much improved from our old one.  Takes photos in much quicker succession.

Reviews.Title: Canon quality
Reviews.Author: M. Hazelip
Reviews.Content: A great little camera from Canon.  Takes nice pictures and the camera is so small you can easily take it anywhere with you. It's got some good features but it's not especially fancy or advanced.  If you are a more avid photographer go for some other camera.  I'm looking forward to taking this camera on some trips and think it'll serve my needs just fine.

Reviews.Title: I bought one, then another
Reviews.Author: Sewing Grandma "Jan"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for myself, and my husband liked it so much I bought him one, too.  He is just as happy with it as I am.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: G. Nash "grammy"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because of the size.  My camera that I have been using for several years is much larger and not convenient to carry to the beach.  This camera is very small and easy to carry and has all the features of my larger one.  I am very pleased with the performance so far.

Reviews.Title: Our Canon camera purchased via Amazon
Reviews.Author: J. Hannan "Just-a-dream"
Reviews.Content: As long-time Amazon customers,we are accustomed to receiving our orders quickly, but in this case,there was an unusually long delay, especially considering the fact that it was advertised as being "in stock".Also, we had expected to receive a memory card with it, however we evidently failed to follow Amazon's ordering procedure properly, so perhaps it was a case of not following the rules "fine-print?On the plus side, the camera is a remarkable product, and contrary to various  negative customer reviews, ours functions perfectly, and we are pleased with it.Thank you,Bill and Joan Hannan

Reviews.Title: Got what i expected!
Reviews.Author: J. Syljebeck
Reviews.Content: This is the 4th Canon Powershot I have owned and I love this one the best. The camera has a great feature that autofocuses and takes quick photos--something I find really important with moving targets like children. Kids move and change expressions very quickly so the continuous autofocus button (which some could find annoying)I find does the trick! And its ability to remove red eye is better than the older versions I have owned. The only thing I am hoping is that the lens error message and lens getting stuck doesnt happen with this one. But because I already knew the features and have the charger it was a good investment. And the orange color makes it unique and easy to keep track of in a room full of cameras.

Reviews.Title: Excellent and CUTE
Reviews.Author: Natasha E. Saleh
Reviews.Content: I had a canon before this and I love Canon's! They are easy to use and their picture quality is the best. The only part I don't like on this is that if you have the setting on AUTO sometimes the pictures come out blurry so normally i keep it programed. That's it though, it works great and has been useful for my purposes! It super cute and affordable

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera SD1200
Reviews.Author: K. Albright
Reviews.Content: Shipped in good condition and expedious.  Like the small size of camera and yet fairly large viewer.  Good pictures and easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SD1200IS
Reviews.Author: AbbysK
Reviews.Content: For my level this camera is great. I've had a canon SureShot 35mm for decades and it still takes great pics so I stuck with that brand to go digital. I wanted the traditional view finder on any digital I would get and that's the case with the Canons. I also consider reports from "Consumer Reports" magazine. So I'm pleased.

Reviews.Title: A great full featured compact camera
Reviews.Author: Javadog
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about this camera.  It takes great pictures and has more features than the average person will ever figure out how to use. It is compact and lightweight, perfect for the outdoor enthusiast to carry along.  This camera is hard to beat for the money. I only gave it 3 stars for Accessories because it did not come with a memory card. Fortunately I had purchased a 16GB card at the time I ordered the camera.  The cards that come with many of the lower priced cameras are usually pretty small anyways and are replaced at some point.

Reviews.Title: Excellent....better even than expected!
Reviews.Author: Shirley J. Faille
Reviews.Content: This camera came in perfect condition!  Even better than I expected...thank you for great service.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: D. Hart "Country in the City"
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it a whole lot yet, but so far am very satified with the quality of the pictures!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: N. McBride
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera after our 4 MP Olympus bit the dust. This camera is great! The battery life is excellent, the color is very true, and the camera is nice and small to be able to slip in a pocket and not be bulky.  We mainly use the "Program" mode, which handles most of the automatic settings, and so far it has been right on. This camera also has great macro capabilities. You can get VERY close to an object to get it's best detail.

Reviews.Title: Camera review
Reviews.Author: MBump
Reviews.Content: We love our new camera. Its so compact we can take it anywhere and still get great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot SD1200IS is the camera for me!
Reviews.Author: Drumgranny
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I've ever had. It's easy to operate, extremely portable, light, and takes great pictures. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: C. Maxwell
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for a great price!! The biggest downfall of most of my previous cameras is that they are very slow indoors.  I have a 6 year old and his head would be turned away by the time the camera took the picture.  I don't have that problem with this camera.  It works great indoors and out, and the battery life is great!!  i couldn't be happier with this camera.  It replaced a $400 "top of the line" point and shoot that couldn't cut it indoors.  If this one ever dies on me, I wouldn't think twice about replacing it with another!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SD1200 IS
Reviews.Author: Joseph Canino
Reviews.Content: I hadn't used a camera in over 20 years because my Nikon F2A was just too bulky and too much trouble.  With this Canon Powershot SD1200 IS I was taking pictures less than 2 hours after it arrived and the pictures were of good quality and easy to take.  The viewing screen is bright and has good image quality.  Most of the controls are intuitive.  The zoom and auto focus features are really helpful.  It is easy to download pictures to the computer.  It is easy to change batteries and memory card.  I am very happy with this reasonably priced camera.  The one drawback is that the wrist strap is mounted solely for right handed people and is almost impossible and very awkward to use for us lefties.  It was purchased at Amazon and delivered 3 days after the order was placed.Joe Canino

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera Recommended to me.
Reviews.Author: slt "sand"
Reviews.Content: Received quickly.  1st time digital camera recommeded to me for trip.  Still need to figure out all the functions.  So far so good.  Easy to download pictures and send.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: N. Stage "ShininStar385"
Reviews.Content: The camera looks good, is a good size, and takes great pictures. It's also really easy to use. My only complaint is I haven't been able to figure out if I can delete all of the pictures off of my card at once through the camera which is inconvenient if I am out and want to clear my card.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Sasha Merced "Yndirah"
Reviews.Content: I checked tons of professional reviews on different cameras and ended choosing this one because of the consistently good reviews it had.  I definitely agree with all the good reviews.  This camera is small, it has a nice size LCD, and even though I love the new bigger, touchscreen LCD's in some newer models, this camera has better image quality.  It has automatic as well as manual settings and they're easy to set up, and available right from the homescreen.  For low light inside settings, the manual ISO settings work well, the picture does become a bit grainy on lower settings, but this is expected for this type of digital camera.  I love the fact that it has a timer and the option to customize the time and number of shots as well.  It has many extras such as slideshow, cropping and red eye correction all built into the camera. It also has optical image stabilization, which is better than digital stabilization. The video quality is decent, good for internet posting or emailing.This camera actually works excellent compared to most models in this price range, it's very hard to find anything better unless you're willing to pay over $300.  Plus, the battery life is extremely good, I've taken over a thousand pictures and I'm only on my 4th battery charge so far.Edited to add that this camera doesn't have any internal memory, so just keep that in mind.One more thing, with some Cannon printers, you have the option to connect the camera and print right from it without having to buy an additional dock and it has some extra features as well when used together.

Reviews.Title: CANON POWERSHOT
Reviews.Author: DAVID TAYLOR
Reviews.Content: HAPPY HAPPY JOY JOY! EASY TO USE, GREAT PHOTOS AND/OR VIDEOS! EASY TO COPY TO PC USING CANON SOFTWARE. YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED IN THIS POINT AND SHOOT CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: A great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: R. Thiel
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for her birthday. She loves it, but that really isn't such a surprise as a couple of other family members have the same one. It is very compact and yet takes great pictures and very easy to use. The software that comes with it also makes it very easy to upload your pictures. If you are looking for a quality camera at a great price, I would highly recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Powershot Perfection
Reviews.Author: Stacey Crump "MamaCrump"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera just 3 days now and I absolutely love this camera!!! I have had a Nikon Coolpix for about 4 years and I thought that one was cool...this tops that one by far!! Soooooooooo easy!! Pics are so clear / sharp!! I love the autofocus feature where the camera finds all of the faces, puts a box on them all when focus done....and you just shoot!! Amazing.........and small too!!!! Well worth the purchase!!

Reviews.Title: Great travel camera!
Reviews.Author: Kandice Kelley-williamson "KK"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera to carry around on a trip due to it's compact size.  It takes great photos and is so easy to use.  I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Value for the Money
Reviews.Author: augelr
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a vacation I had planned, and was looking for a camera that was very portable but had great picture quality. This camera certainly filled my requirements, and is a breeze to use. It is a very small form-factor, which is great for carrying around and makes it easy to whip out for use. The downside is that it certainly feels like it would be easy to drop because it is so small. To combat this, Canon includes a wrist strap to help anchor it to the user's arm, but I wish that the strap had a way to tighten towards your wrist. I'd imagine this isn't specific to this camera, and it probably more of a Canon compliant.The picture quality is impressive, and the auto-focus works 90% of the time. For the other 10%, the camera has plenty of options in its manual mode to get the proper picture.All in all, I am very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera about a year now. I was looking for something that had a viewfinder- an attribute hard to find nowadays! I love the camera. For my dad's birthday, I knew he wanted the same camera, so I looked into getting him one. The new SD1300 had come out, but it did not have the viewfinder. So I ordered this one for him and he is so happy with it. The SD1200 is no longer in stores, thankfully Amazon still has it! I suggest getting one before they're gone!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: Josh Pincus is Crying "JPiC"
Reviews.Content: This camera replaced my five-year-old Kodak Easy Share. It's a great little camera, takes great pictures and is about half the size and weight of my old Kodak. Easy to use, too.

Reviews.Title: Just great!
Reviews.Author: With Six
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a camera where you can open the box, insert your memory card, and start photographing, this is the camera for you.  Easy to use, and takes great photos.  Also, the optical viewfinder is excellent for people who just aren't comfortable taking photos by looking at the screen (like my husband).

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Abigail M. Rogers "abz"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera to replace an older canon version I had and absolutely love it!  It is still easy to use and takes even better pictures, no complaints from me!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me
Reviews.Author: W. Peay
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for someone who takes pictures for concerts, beach, out with friends or any other random things.  I am young and dont need a camera for much but special occasions and this camera has not disappointed.  I have used it at several concerts and it was perfect.  The zoom could be a little better but I cant complain.  Also I am very happy with the video.  Plenty of space to record numerous things or a 14 minute song at a Clapton concert.

Reviews.Title: Best Digital Camera I have ever bought.
Reviews.Author: Pablo Rivera "Pablo Rivera"
Reviews.Content: This is the best digital camera I have ever bought in my entire life, since it can focus very fast the picture you are going to take every time you move the camera from one side to the other.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Defillippo "~~JennD.'J.M.J.'~*"
Reviews.Content: Several family members already have this camera, in different colors of course, & I have wanted to get one for myself for quite a while.I already own a Canon EOS Rebel XSi ~ including the fancy macro & wide-angle lens attachments ~ but as wonderful as that is, it is also cumbersome taking it along to family events, especially when some occasions call for an actual video recording.So, I finally broke down & bought this one, in blue, & couldn't be happier. It is convenient, easy to work & I finally have a quality compact camera that takes GOOD videos of things that I want to keep in memory. And to top it all off, I even found this one on sale when I did order it. :)I would recommend this camera to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Briana Rioux
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this camera. It is great for taking pictures of my children! I use it mostly for that, but lately I have been using it to take pictures of things to post on eBay and I am amazed at how clear the close up pictures I have taken of jewelry etc. come out. I have always owned multiple cameras for use with different things, but I am able to have just one for everything. I am in love with it!

Reviews.Title: love my new sd1200
Reviews.Author: T. Hardwick
Reviews.Content: It's about time we had a camera that was easy to carry, easy to use and took great pictures.  Thank you Canon, the SD1200IS is a jewel.

Reviews.Title: good pocket sized point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Suzy Q "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed this little camera, but I must say I miss my last camera that was lost.  My last digital camera was a PowerShot SD850 IS Digital ELPH.  It only had 8 MP and I thought, well since I am buying a new one, I will go up to 10 MP with this camera.  But my pictures came out so much better on the SD850.  But I must also say that this new camera is super easy to use and very user friendly.  I was able to pick it up and start using without reading the directions.  My friend was amazed since I had just taken it out of the box and was able to go back to previous pictures and zoom in, etc.  So, this would be a great camera for any normal picture taking and so small and light weight...you can take it anywhere.  If you never had the SD850, you wouldn't know what you are missing.  The pictures come out fine and still much better quality than many out there.  My sister has the cool pix and my pictures blows hers away.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very compact and easy-to-use camera. I bought this one after my Powershot SD400 finally died and I'm glad I ended up with this one. More features than the 400 and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Finally, my perfect little camera!
Reviews.Author: Melissa M. Ogg
Reviews.Content: I've been a Kodak customer since the inception of digital cameras but with this purchase I'm a convert!  I'm not a professional photographer, nor do I play one on TV, but it's sooo easy to get high quality photos (by my standards) out of this camera in any lighting and at any speed.  Probably the best purchase I've made in a while.  Look no further!

Reviews.Title: A Great Value
Reviews.Author: Danielle TargetLover
Reviews.Content: There are newer models available of the Canon Powershot now, but you can get everything you need and want in this version, at a better price point (plus there are cuter colors to choose from). I have been storing this camera in my purse and have been able to capture great pictures and videos on the fly. This is the third Canon Powershot that I have upgraded, and I have never been anything less than completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: My sister loves it!
Reviews.Author: Navywife0405
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister's birthday.  She LOVES it.  I like the price and bought it solely on reviews.  She loves orange so that worked out well too.  She said it takes great pictures and she loves all of the features that are on it.  The picture quality was much better than her kodak that broke after a year of owning it.  I do wish that amazon would offer signature conformation for all higher end items.  This package ended up missing for a few days but said was delivered.  I was very upset that they didn't required a signature on a digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Great point & click camera
Reviews.Author: R. Brichta
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a Canon PowerShot that I got about 2.5 years ago, and this camera is working great. It's definitely easy to use and there hasn't been any trouble getting good photos. I love the color, which makes my camera stand out from others if I'm with friends who are also taking pictures. I have a baby coming in a few weeks and we're hoping that this camera works well for LOTS of infant pictures!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera, great pictues & small size
Reviews.Author: NJPete61
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace our older Canon SD1000, which we owned for a couple of years, and handed down to my daughter.  The SD1200 also takes excellent pictures, and because of it's small size we tend to take more pictures.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!!
Reviews.Author: Curly
Reviews.Content: The camera is small enough to fit into your pocket and excellent pictures! I love the picture quality and color! Highly recommended. Plus, really cute color!

Reviews.Title: Awesome camrea
Reviews.Author: I. Avneri "I"
Reviews.Content: I got Camera for my brother as a gift. He was looking for a cheap portable camera, because he likes to travel a lot, spends a lot of time camping etc.This camera is so small its amazing! and the quality of the pictures are great. I was very impressed with the quality of the video, I really didn't expect so much from such a small camera.A great buy in a great price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Satisfied Bill
Reviews.Content: Purchased the SD1200IS to replace our 4 year old Canon.  This camera works extremely well.  We took over 200 pictures at our son's wedding and are very pleased with ease of use and quality of pictures.  You can even take flashless pictures in dimly lit rooms and they are excellent quality.Great Camera.  My son bought the older version of this camera a few years ago and it still provides excellent pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, no case or memory card
Reviews.Author: Bryan Park
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera - I'm very impressed so far. One thing that the photos don't quite convey is just how compact it is - lots of great features in a very small package.I wanted to echo something that other people have written. It's not packaged with a memory card. I recommend the Kingston 8GB SD HC Card:[...]It's $17 for 8GB, which will hold 3000 pictures at the maximum 10 megapixels. The camera accepts SD, SDHC, MultiMedia, MMCplus, and HC MMCplus cards.The camera comes with a wrist strap, but no case. I got this one:[...]It's just a cover to protect the camera - it doesn't have any pockets for accessories. If you want one, there are plenty of third party camera cases out there. You really should get some kind of case to protect the camera (especially the large LCD screen) from scratches.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Cansuper
Reviews.Content: Nothing bad to say about this camera. It takes great pictures and my wife couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: My daughter who is seventeen, loves this camera.  It seems to take good pictures and it is fairly sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SD1200IS
Reviews.Author: Darryl Miller "ichbin73"
Reviews.Content: We really like the camera. It is a compact little camera with a fairly quick shutter speed. I like the rechargeable battery pack.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Wu
Reviews.Content: This is an easy to use point and click digital camera.  I am very happy with the quality of the pictures and the resolution when enlarging images.

Reviews.Title: Potable & easy to use & shiny color
Reviews.Author: Yang Zhenzi "Anne. Y"
Reviews.Content: The camera is very fashionable,easy to use and with high quality. Also, the price is quite reasonable, I think. It would be even better if the product can include a sleeve and a memory card.

Reviews.Title: Loved It!!
Reviews.Author: B. Hunter "BH"
Reviews.Content: I just love my camera. It's small fits in my purse and I take it everywhere. I bought a sd card for it and it was like $20 and holds 1400 pictures. I really like this camera.

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: jeannieo
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas - she loves it - she hasn't had any problems with blurry pictures and it is small and takes great pictures for the price.

Reviews.Title: CANON CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Joanatha Brenner "CASSIEGIRL"
Reviews.Content: GREAT LIGHTWEIGHT AND COMPACT CAMERA WITH PERFECT FEATURES.I HAVEN'T OWNED A BAD CANON CAMERA YET.SELLER SHIPPED AS STATED AND A SMOOTH TRANSACTION WAS HAD. VERY HAPPY AND PLEASED WITH THE PERFORMANCE OF THIS CAMERA AND I USE IT QUITE OFTEN. GREAT PICTURES.

Reviews.Title: good cam for the $
Reviews.Author: Van Hanounikian
Reviews.Content: Camera is good. Auto setting is bad. Learn How to get a good manual setting a experiment to take good pictures.

Reviews.Title: The Perfect Little Camera
Reviews.Author: J. C. Samanich
Reviews.Content: This is my second Elf camera and I just love it!  It is very compact, lightweight, easy to use and can fit in a purse or pocket.  I love to take pictures but do not enjoy carrying a large camera around my neck.  That is why this is the perfect camera.I recently visited the Christmas tree at Rockefeller Center and the beautiful decorated windows on 5th Avenue.  All my pictures came out perfect and some of them look just like a picture postcard.  All I had to do was to point and shoot and everything else was automatic. Wow! Thanks, Amazon for your quick delivery service.  I highly recommend this camera--You will not be disappointed!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: ben graham "BDG"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter and she loves it.  The ease of use and size make it the perfect gift.  The quality of the pictures are excellent for a camera this size as well.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: G. Bruno
Reviews.Content: For the price, there really isn't a better option.  Great camera, and very good quality pictures.  Very portable, my sister loves it.

Reviews.Title: Gift for daughter
Reviews.Author: Paul A. Rutherford
Reviews.Content: I'd asked one daughter to recommend a camera for us to purchase as a gift for the other.  This was it and I think she is very pleased with it.  Doesn't come with a card so purchased the large one due to it taking movies too.

Reviews.Title: Easy to carry for everyday shooting!
Reviews.Author: Y. Xu
Reviews.Content: This camera is a supplemental to my SRL. Great to put in the pocket anywhere, any time. Never miss a shot. Very easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever!
Reviews.Author: S. Gregg "PictureCrazy"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for graduation and I was so upset when I lost it. So over Thanksgiving I found a decent price for it and decided to purchase another camera. I could have gotten a cheaper camera but I knew that this camera would last a long time, it would take great pictures, and look great! I do not regret my decision one bit!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jillian C
Reviews.Content: I love it.  Great camera to capture all the little awesome moments of life.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love my new camera!
Reviews.Author: Morning rain
Reviews.Content: Just received my camera 1 week ago and have not had much time to take photos but what I can say now it is a great camera for its price, first of all I like its small size, amazing picture's quality and it has so many features I haven't used them and I can't wait to experiment.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Product
Reviews.Author: Austin Bear
Reviews.Content: We were able to start taking pictures (after charging the battery) with ease.  Pictures are sharp and focused.  There is so much more to this camera that we're looking forward to learning about and using.

Reviews.Title: This camera is great!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera!  I have owed three Canon Power Shot camera's and I think it's one of the best point and shoot camera's on the market.  The image stabilizer makes the quality of the photos so much better and the quality of the video is pretty good.  It's a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Laura Berry
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera and excellent delivery time. The camera works fantastically, especially the video quality! Two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Ernest L. Harper
Reviews.Content: I bought this great little camera as a Christmas gift for my son.  The service from Amazon was typically great and the price was as good as I found anywhere.  The only downside was that shortly after the camera was delivered, Canon reduced their price nationwide by $30.

Reviews.Title: Awesome travel camera
Reviews.Author: Jean L. Perry
Reviews.Content: We purchased this little camera for a trip to London this Christmas season.  Lots of museums, night time activities, dimly lit pubs.  Of course we brought the battery charger, but forgot our adapter....so we crossed our fingers that the battery would hold for a week.  No problem!  It slides easily in and out of a pocket, took great photos in the daylight and night.  Even night shots without flash came out beautifully.  Our other camera is a canon also, so the controls were easy to learn.  The leather case barely increased the size overall and gave good protection.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful, easy to use
Reviews.Author: amanda hill
Reviews.Content: Love this camera,picture quality is excellent and the image estabilization work great.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Decent little camera for the price
Reviews.Author: B. Eastwood "Teancum74"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera for the price.  The small size is sometimes a little hard with my big hands, but the picture quality and the options on the camera have been excellent.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: K. Grishina
Reviews.Content: I love canons because they are easy to use and also provide great picture quality. I also like the small size of this one. It works well. Battery charges fast

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: S. Delia
Reviews.Content: I have the older version of this camera and bought this one for my teenage daughter. It received a recommended buy rating in Consumer Reports. Easy to use and great pictures.  Small enough to fit in pocket or purse.  Still get red-eye sometimes even with the reduction on but can easily remove it.  The best part was that it was less expensive to purchase online from Amazon than the store website or even in the store.  It arrived by regular shipping in 3 days.

Reviews.Title: Great little Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Steven Knochenmus "Knochy"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were looking for a smaller camera to take with us on vacation. We purchased this camera and couldn't be happier. It is small emough to fit into a pocket so carrying it around was never a burden. The point and shoot capabilities are really great. We were in Cabo and this camera took great pictures no matter what the lighting was. The video record feature is excellent and we got some great footage of the waves crashing in. I had previously never had a camera with face detection and have found this feature invaluable. Still playing around with everything this camera has to offer. Stick with Cannon they make a great product.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Love Key West
Reviews.Content: Puchased the camera just before a vacation and had not had time to test it.  The pictures the camera took were awesome.  A point and shot camera.  We went into some dark caves and the pictures the camera took were fantastic. I never thought they would even come out.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Polar Bear
Reviews.Content: This is a gret little camera.  It is fairly easy to understand (I wouldn't give to my grandmother, but my mother can use it), and works smoothly.  I carried it around Italy in the front pocket of my jeans and barely noticed it. It works well in low light when you cannot use a flash... and lets you know when you are shaking it to much to get a clean shot.  Very good camera and the color can't be beat.  I bought it for my wife, who decided it was much funnier if I carried it for her.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Andres Liberman Bronfman
Reviews.Content: We upgraded from the SD200, bought five years ago, and I'm extremely happy with my choice. Wouldn't trade Cannon for any other brand.

Reviews.Title: A great Camera For The Price
Reviews.Author: Russell A. Duncan "Russ"
Reviews.Content: I own quite a number of Canon cameras.  All of which I enjoy for their quality and pictures produced.  This model is a wonderful blending of resolution, size, battery life and workmanship.I would recommend it to all casual photography buffs.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the size and price.
Reviews.Author: G. Smith
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for its size and price.  Very compact and easy to pull out for a quick shot.  Very easy to use with logical buttons and menu function.  Picture quality is very good for what we use the camera for.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera but wish it had a better zoom
Reviews.Author: K. McMahan
Reviews.Content: This camera is the perfect size.  I keep it in my purse so I never miss important events like I used to in the past because I would forget my camera all the time.  It is easy to use but I need to learn more about all the features.  I LOVE the color!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Trip Recorder
Reviews.Author: TN Pastfinder
Reviews.Content: After learning how to use this camera for a month I took a two week trip to Hawaii and gave it a workout.  I was very happy with the results in automatic mode but I still have a lot to learn to become an advanced user.

Reviews.Title: Loooooove It!!!!!
Reviews.Author: N. Hill "shopping frenzie"
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! Super cute and fits perfectly in a pocket. The only thing I've had trouble with it in the dark pictures. Which I've found is hard for any camera. But all in all.....yes so worth the money!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Megan S. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this camera overall.  I received it quickly and it is easy to use compared to the sd1100 canon i had.  I felt like it doesn't focus automatically as well (i am not a very knowledgeable photographer) but overall takes good pictures.  I like the "play" feature to be able to look at pictures and switch back to taking photos easily.  It's also nice and small (and cute!).  The battery life I have been extremely impressed with.  I think I have charged it once and have had it almost a month.

Reviews.Title: State of the Art
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Sweig
Reviews.Content: This is a top of the line camera. The only thing wrong with it is me. I'm not a very good photographer, but this camera makes me look a lot better than I am. The controls are pretty intuitive; my only complaint is you have to get used to the arrow keys being labeled as something else. I can't vote on the battery life because I haven't had to charge it yet (except for the first time. The detail in the photos is exquisite.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: JoAnn
Reviews.Content: This camera takes amazing pictures.  The photos are clear and crisp and the color is absolutely vivid.I purchased this particular camera because it was given a great review by Consumer Reports, and they were right!I am extremely pleased with my new Canon Poweshot SD 1200.  It's everything you need in a digital camera.

Reviews.Title: greatest little camera
Reviews.Author: debutante "debutante"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera from amazon in june and I just love it.  This is the first digital camera for me.  I was amazed how easy it was to operate from the time I turned it on, the pictures are beautiful and the zoon lens and auto focus is superb. It is small enough I can throw it in my purse and that's usually where I keep it.  The battery stays charged forever and I love the separate charger that plugs in, it charges the battery very quickly. I love the pretty green color. I can't say enough about this camera, and it takes great videos too. This is the camera to buy, snap it up at this special buy, you won't be sorry. This may be the last camera I will ever buy.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING CAMERA
Reviews.Author: A. Sutty
Reviews.Content: this camera takes amazingly awesome pictures and makes you look really pretty. all of my friends ended up buying the same camera too. its lightweight and easy to use, long battery life and you can get memory cards with tons of storage to take 100s of pictures at one time. highly highly highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Point & Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: K. Sabio
Reviews.Content: I bought this digital camera after my Canon SD750 broke, and so far it's been great. Takes great quality pics and it's very portable. I'm not one of those savvy camera guys where I know a lot about the different options a camera can do. I'm more of a "if it takes good pictures, then I'm sold" type of camera guy and this is a great camera if you're looking for something you can take anywhere and have a great quality picture. I've heard complaints about the navigation buttons on the back, and although it was not as easy to use (as far as the buttons are concerened) as my old SD750, I didn't find it to be to problematic or annoying. The only thing that could make this camera better is if they removed the optic viewer. It would have given more room for a bigger LCD screen. But that's just my preference, some people prefer having the optic viewer. So in conclusion, great camera, great price. 100% recommend it to those looking for something simple that'll do the everyday job of taking nice clean pictures.

Reviews.Title: LoveIt!
Reviews.Author: M. Cantu
Reviews.Content: I received my first Canon PowerShot Elph from my brother over 4 years ago. So this was an upgrade for me. I loved my first one and I love this one.My mother has one, too, and she is very pleased with hers as well. I am still getting  a feel for my new one, but I am very happy with it! The orange color is awesome! And the fact that you can recharge the battery appeals to my "green" side!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic little camera!
Reviews.Author: Katy Candu "Katydid2008"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera! You certainly can't beat the quality for the price. I highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Love my Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: D. G. Scatton
Reviews.Content: Consumer Reports rated the SD1200 IS very highly. I shopped around and this was the best price for a new camera.  It arrived in the mail sooner than the ad said.  I love the small size - so light and fits easily in my purse.  I also like that it has a viewfinder. Haven't had it long enough to comment on the battery life, but it's easy to use and takes great pictures and video. I love it!

Reviews.Title: My Favorite Digi Cam
Reviews.Author: Jersey
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality and the video mode picture is fantastic! BUT, I purchased this one to replace my other. The lens went out on my other one and everything looked blurry. I had that one for about a year. My one prior to that had the same problems...I used my camera daily for work purposes, but I really got my moneys worth out of it! I recommend it! :)

Reviews.Title: good value for money
Reviews.Author: Aviator "Sanjiv"
Reviews.Content: Good value for the price. Best point and shoot in its range. If you want to shed some more monet then 780 is the way to go but thi sdoes all what I need to compliment my Nikon SLR D-90

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Vikram Chakilam
Reviews.Content: A very good camera for beginners, I gifted this to my wife and she loved it very much. Excellent features, good picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great and easy to use!
Reviews.Author: D. Laufer
Reviews.Content: This is the best digital camera for your money.  It's portable, really easy to use and creates high quality pictures.  I just came back from a trip and all my friends were amazed at how good the pictures looked.  The camera easily fit in my pocket so I was able to easily grab it to snag all the pics I wanted!I've had other, similar digital cameras which took longer to focus and pictures did not come out as well.

Reviews.Title: An Amazing Camera! I am sooo impressed!
Reviews.Author: R.A.V-H "reneeAvh"
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with this camera. I just recently bought it and have already taken hundreds of amazing shots with it.Before this camera I had had a Nikon Coolpix, but after it took a swim, I needed a replacement. This camera is very small, so it easily slides into my pocket and it's light, so it doesn't weigh down my wrist.The quality of the pictures was very good. I took pictures that turned out so amazingly. The features and options for the pictures also help bring out the colors in certain landscapes.I recommend this camera to someone who is looking for a good digital camera. It is portable and fits my needs. It can be used as a goof-around camera(taking pictures with your friends on an outing or at a party) or a digital camera that takes the quality pics you want. (Just the other day I got some astonishing shots on the beach, using the beach and sunset modes.)It's awesome and I will NEVER regret buying it! :)

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: DND
Reviews.Content: I purchased to replace a crap sony T1, This Canon take very good pictures and is easy to use. So far, battery live seems very good and it has done everything I have needed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: H. Lamb "KnowItAll"
Reviews.Content: It's a very basic camera that takes pictures that are anything but basic. Very easy to use. Small and light-weight. Excellent picture quality. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Sharp, quick, and easy
Reviews.Author: Donald M. Scott
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It takes sharp pictures with good oolor. It is small, easy to use, and responds quickly.  I wanted a camera with a viewfinder because I go days at a time with no opportunity to recharge, and so I leave the LCD off.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA!! BUY IT!!
Reviews.Author: K. Holland
Reviews.Content: I love Canon Elph cameras. They take amazing pictures, are easy to use and are the perfect size to take anywhere. I bought this one after my Canon Elph 700 model fell into the water at Busch Gardens. I am so happy with it. They finally improved the first shot delay. With an 18 month old, the delay on my old camera was killing me and I was missing some good moments due to the delay. I am sure that there are better cameras out there but for the price this one is a great choice. Check Consumer Reports, this one is rated as the #1 best buy for compact digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great camera but WHY is the charger gray?
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: This camera is really cool, takes great pictures, but mine came with a gray-colored battery and a gray-colored charger.  Previously I had ordered the same one, and the charger was white, and the battery was white.  White looks SO much sharper than gray.  That's my only complaint!Other than the cheap-looking battery charger, this camera is worth it.

Reviews.Title: Llloyd review
Reviews.Author: Thomas W. Lloyd
Reviews.Content: I like the camera. It was what I was looking for. I miss a small instruction book. An 8 1/2 x 11 printout is not convenient to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: M. Vatsa "Deal Hunter"
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for the price. Has all the basic features. It easily fits in the pocket. Perfect to take it for weekend trips and I don't have to carry my DSLR for day-to-day pictures. At this point I don't have any cons for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Mr Tp
Reviews.Author: Thomas F. Pruitt
Reviews.Content: Product operates as promised.  It is very easy to use and easy to install software on PC

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Howard L. Clodfelter "theHow"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. The time from shot to shot is very good.  Very good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Bhavish Kothari
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera, easily fits in your pocket. Takes quick and great pictures. Only it has limited zoom (3x). But the quality of images is really good and its worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera! Very Pleased!!
Reviews.Author: R. Hunt
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. Everything came as specified the camera works great. Couldnt ask for a better or a more fun little camera for all ocassions.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Choice
Reviews.Author: Beverly S. Jar
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to say that I searched all over for a new digital camera when both of my previous Pentax cameras broke down on me and I decided on the Canon PowerShot (in pink of course) and couldn't be more happier with my choice.  I went to the local stores to check out the different camera choices I was looking in to and found out that this was the best overall one for me.  I came home and ordered it right away especially since I got it cheaper through Amazon then I would have paid in my local stores. Thanks again, I love my new camera and all it can do.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the money!
Reviews.Author: Paul Elliott "new father"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to have something very small that I could throw in my pocket, but still get better quality photos than my cell phone.  The camera is the perfect size and was a great buy for the money.  I would definitely recommend it for anyone looking for convenience, good quality, and a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Amazed by the picture quality!
Reviews.Author: Viet Hoang
Reviews.Content: I have owned/purchased the Canon digital cameras in many series but still I was able to immediately notice the significant improvement in picture quality as well as the flash support when doing shots at night/in dark room. This camera does surprise me. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Rednan
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing camera for a novice.  The colors are vibrant, the zoom for E-Bay sales, signage, etc. is fabulous.  We just returned from a trip to British Columbia, I knew nothing about the camera before I left, used it with no knowledge (and on automatic the whole time), and the photos are great.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: J. Jackson
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing.  I bought it for its size - I wanted something that took up little space in my suitcase.  The pictures I got were clear and beautiful - even the ones that were zoomed to the max.  I got some great pictures of very shy birds that I took from a long way off - the birds look as though they are very close and there is no blurring in the photos.  This camera is worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Sweet camera, great pics
Reviews.Author: MKSinSA
Reviews.Content: After comparing this camera against the Nikon Coolpix L20 10MP Digital Camera with 3.6 Optical Zoom and 3 inch LCD (Deep Red) and the Kodak EasyShare M1063 10.3 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Red) lines, for the price and size, this point-and-shoot wins.Past experience with the EasyShare cameras has shown poor battery performance and clunky controls. While Nikon makes some of the best SLR cameras in the world, they fall behind Canon in the 10 MP arena. There is a good reason that Canon holds most of the spots above Nikon's #7 place on the best sellers list and why this Canon is Consumer Report's top Recommended digital point-and-shoot.The only thing that knocked this camera from a five-star rating is it's somewhat convoluted menu system.
